wikipedia_page.main: William Humble David Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley (5 January 1920 – 16 November 2013), styled Viscount Ednam from 1932 to 1969, was a British peer.

response: * William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley (1920–2013), British peer
* 5 January – William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley, life peer (died 2013)

Astor was married three times.  He married firstly on 23 October 1944 to Ana Inez "Chiquita" Carcano y Morra (1918–1992), daughter of the Argentine ambassador (from 1942 to 1946) and a prominent Catholic woman, which hurt his relationship with his mother.Sykes (1984), p. 75Thornton (1997), p. 444 His mother had abandoned the Church of Rome for Christian Science.  Ana's sister, Stella Carcano y Morra, married William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley in 1946. Before their divorce in 1972, Jakie and Ana had three children:The Peerage, entry for Sir John Jacob Astor

* William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley (1920–2013), who married Stella Carcano y Morra, a daughter of Don Miguel Angel Carcano, who was the Argentine Ambassador to the U.K. They divorced in 1960 and he married the Scottish actress and socialite Maureen Swanson.
*William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley, 93, British peer.William Humble David Ward 4th Earl of Dudley

He is the son of William Ward, 4th Earl of Dudley, whom he succeeded in 2013. David Ward is the cousin of the actress and director Rachel Ward. He married Sarah Mary Coats on 3 July 1972; they divorced in 1976. He then married Debra Louise Pinney in 1976; they had a daughter, Bethany Rowena Ward, in 1977, and were divorced in 1980. He was educated at Eton College and at Oxford. In 2003, he lived in France."William Humble David Jeremy Ward, 5th Earl of Dudley", thepeerage.com
